Name: DOOORS VR
About the game: 'DOOORS VR' is stage clear type real escape content. In the smartphone application, the popular series that exceeded the cumulative total of 30 million DL has been reborn as VR contents that can be enjoyed more intuitively. The goal of this game is to break out of the rooms. Solve the mystery hidden in the room, use the item, open the door and complete all the stages!
